component.name: ITGMania
component.summary: Rhythm and dance game forked from StepMania
component.developer_name: Chris Danford, the StepMania and ITGMania development teams, et al.

description.p: ITGMania is a StepMania fork improved for the post-ITG community. It is a free dance and rhythm game for Windows, Mac, and Linux. It features 3D graphics, keyboard and "dance pad" support, and an editor for creating your own steps.
